SchoolWindow: ^<color=#ffffffff>You peer out of the window, the sky blue and bright.
^<color=#ffffffff>The wind blows, taking Cherry Blossoms and local leaves in its trails.
^<color=#ffffffff>And the perfect time to bake a wonderful batch of bread.
^<color=#ffffffff>Enough fantasies, this beauty will still be here to see another day.
